definition: to raise/to aid/to support/to save/to rescue

pinyin: Zheng3 jiu4 Da4 bing1 Rui4 en1

sentences.english: Happened, the vessel motorboat to save not escape.
sentences.chinese: 剛巧，有艘汽艇經過，拯救尚未逃生者。

sentences.english: This is the day of salvation, calling sinners to repent and believe the gospel.
sentences.chinese: 這是拯救的時代，呼召罪人悔改，相信福音。

sentences.english: E. g. He sacrificed his life to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他犧牲自己的性命去拯救溺水的孩子。

sentences.english: Now, only the light of one small hobbit's faith can save the world.
sentences.chinese: 現在只有一個小霍比特人的信仰之光能拯救世界了。

sentences.english: But if you did come unhooked, here's a device that could save your life.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你失去了保障，有一個裝置能拯救你的生命。

sentences.english: Beauty elim realized she was the only one to save the navy kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 美琳意識到她是唯一拯救海藍王國的人。

sentences.english: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華靠近傷心的人，拯救靈性痛悔的人。

sentences.english: He has to do lone heroes to save his beloved woman.
sentences.chinese: 他要做孤膽英雄去拯救自己心愛的女人。

sentences.english: So is Pachauri right that going vegetarian can save the planet?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，帕喬裏提出的素食能拯救地球是否正確？

sentences.english: Can we take back our Country before we lose it to finantial slavery?
sentences.chinese: 國家成爲金融奴隸之前我們是否能拯救它呢？

sentences.english: He sent forth his word and healed them, and rescued them from destruction.
sentences.chinese: 主發一言就將他們病除，且拯救他們脫離了陰府。

sentences.english: Vishnu changed for the dwarf and Beelzebub fighting to save the world's religious story of relief.
sentences.chinese: 毗溼奴變作侏儒與魔王戰鬥拯救世界的宗教故事浮雕。

sentences.english: It seems that maybe Tony may be the only one able to save her.
sentences.chinese: 至此湯尼看似就是那唯一能夠拯救她的人。

sentences.english: That means not only saving the people with MDR-TB but also the general population.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅意味着拯救耐多藥結核病人，也拯救所有的人。

sentences.english: That means not only saving the people with MDR-TB but also the general population.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅意味着拯救耐多藥結核病人，也拯救所有的人。

sentences.english: They waited for someone to come rescue them from their nightmare.
sentences.chinese: 他們等待有那麼一個人能夠將他們從惡夢中拯救出來。

definition: to revive/(lit. and fig.) to come back to life/(religion) resurrection
to pull strongly against a crazy tide (idiom); fig. to try hard to save a desperate crisis
to rise from the dead (idiom); fig. an unexpected recovery
to offer/to give (as tribute)/to devote (one's life)/to sacrifice (oneself)
